data.name: Soul Hackers 2 - Bonus Story Arc: The Lost Numbers
data.detailed_description: Grants access to "The Lost Numbers" bonus story arc and new dungeon.
data.about_the_game: Grants access to "The Lost Numbers" bonus story arc and new dungeon.
data.short_description: Grants access to "The Lost Numbers" bonus story arc and new dungeon.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 22 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low 1080p @ 30 FPS (80% Render Scale)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High 1080p @ 60 FPS (100% Render Scale)
